The Lunar Pixie heals for 1d4 + 5. Range: 30 feet.

description.p: The Lunar Felidae are lunatic versions of a tiger, lion or any other cat-like creature. They tend to have eyes in the range of blue, silver and white. Their fur may have a slightly silver shine.
Lunar Felidae may be used as mount. They may carry two medium creatures at once.
The Lunar Felidae has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

sheet.description: The Lunar Felidae has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

description.p: If the Lunar Felidae moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the panther can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.
